subject: Basketball
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: A suspected bookmaker whose lawyer says he is being investigated in the scandal involving the former N.B.A. referee Timothy Donaghy was convicted of criminal conspiracy and bookmaking in 1998.
snippet: A suspected bookmaker whose lawyer says he is being investigated in the scandal involving the former N.B.A. referee Timothy Donaghy was convicted of criminal conspiracy and bookmaking in 1998.
